fullplot: Barney Springboro and Peyton Nichols are fun-loving high school students working on a science project with white mice. When one of the mice begins to move food toward itself with out touching it, Barney finds he has accidentally discovered a formula for telekinetic powers. Now, how much trouble can a high school kid who can move things with just his mind get into?
plot: A high school science nerd gains telekinetic powers after a laboratory accident and uses them for revenge upon bullies.
title: Zapped!
